action.text: Amendment SA 680, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 680 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 680 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S6451-6456) To provide an amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 680 proposed by Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 680 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
